name: Block Playground Physics
description:
This is a game i made because well, i was bored :D

Big thanks to  Scivolo Character Controller for saving me SO much time, i really recommend it because it saves you so much time. Heres the link to it: Scivolo Character Controller | Physics | Unity Asset Store (also not sponsored)

Also if you know why the ui buttons becomes small when i build the game, please let me know since its so annoying.
